metadata.tags: reggey, ska stealdrumm, up beat, kölsch
metadata.prompt:
(Intro)
Ey, ich stonn he am Strand,
dat is' nit Kölle, aber ejal,
weil ich spür et janz jenau…
Usedom, Baby – Reggae en d’r Ostsee!
Woah – joo!

(Strophe 1)
Bin en kölsche Jung, doch he bliev ich länger
Denn de Wind es mild un et Leben es wenger
Stress un Hektik bliev zohus
Hier jibbet Sonne statt Verdruss (Ey!)

Iwwerall Sand, de Möwe schreit
Un ich tanz met d’r Flaschenpost durch d’r Zeit
Usedom, du jeile Insle
Hier krieg selbst dr Köbes Hitzepickel (Haha!)

(Pre-Chorus)
Reggae klingt us'm Lautsprecher raus
Un ich spill op d’r Luftmatratz' Schach met d’r Maus
Dat is kein Trick, dat es Levve
Usedom, ich well dich nie mehr abgewe' (Woah!)

(Kölscher Chorus)
Sommerjeföhl
Palme danze
Naachlang danze (Danze)
DJ spillt op (Oh, oh, oh, oh)
Sommerjeföhl
Strand un Füer
Et brennt en mir (Brennt!)
Ich will nur dir (Nur dir)

(Strophe 2)
Zelten am Strand, Scholle frisch op’m Grill
Un ich sing met dä Jungs: „Dat es, wat ich will!“
Strandkörv in Reih, Seebrück’ wie im Film
In Ahlbeck danze selbst d’r Möw' met Stil (Ey!)

Bäderarchitektur, alles blink un blank
Reggae läuft, jeder Pitter wird zum Sang
Usedom, du häs et jeblick
Machst us Kölsche zu Jamaika-shick (Joo!)

(Pre-Chorus)
He stonn Palmen aus Plastik, doch es ejal
Denn et Herz schläht op One Love-Kanal
Mit e Flönz in d’r Hand un Rhythm im Blut
Bringe ich kölsche Sonn' met Roots – alles joot!

(Kölscher Chorus)
Sommerjeföhl
Palme danze
Naachlang danze (Danze)
DJ spillt op (Oh, oh, oh, oh)
Sommerjeföhl
Strand un Füer
Et brennt en mir (Brennt!)
Ich will nur dir (Nur dir)

(Bridge)
Und wenn et rägnet – och kein Ding
Denn ich spür d’r Bass, wie er springt un springt
Usedom, du häs mie verzaubert
Neu-Deutsch Jamaika – wat für e Zauberkraft! (Jaja!)

(Letzter Chorus – mit extra Adlibs)
Sommerjeföhl (Ey, Summer!)
Palme danze (Jo, sway met mir!)
Naachlang danze (Danze – durch!)
DJ spillt op (Oh, oh, oh, oh – fire!)
Sommerjeföhl (Ey, yeah!)
Strand un Füer
Et brennt en mir (Brennt!)
Ich will nur dir (Nur dir – woah!)

(Outro)
Op Usedom jibt et kein Dom,
aber dä Vibe – dä es wie Zohus
Kölsch un Reggae – dat es e Muss
Neu-Deutsch Jamaika – op d’r Ostseekus’t
Joo!

metadata.tags: Caribbean, Tropical, Reggae, Ska, Dubstep, EDM, Epic, Heroic, Cinematic, Cosmic, Adventure, Intense, Atmospheric, Ambient, Steel Drums, Synth Pads, Dynamic Percussion, Battle, funny
metadata.prompt:
[Intro: After the Fall]
(Flickering lights. Dust settles. A deep rumble in the distance)
The Rat King falls, Cyber rats are gone, the island stands,
but something stirs beneath the sands.
A hidden force, a twisted scheme,
this war ain't over—just caught in between.

Super Canal Rodent Hunter breathes out slow,
wipes his brow, thinks it's time to go. (Finally)
But then—a crack, a shift, a sound so deep,
the ground caves in, drags him beneath. (Oh, come on)

[Darkness. Then a flickering neon light. A distorted voice speaks]
“You beat the King... but you never asked—who built the throne?”

[Verse 1: The Lab Below]
He wakes up in a room, cold steel, bright screens,
tubes full of something—pulsing, obscene.
A lab, abandoned, but not quite dead,
machines humming, blinking red.

Figures in the dark, shadows in sync,
glowing eyes watching—waiting to think.
A scientist steps in, smirk so wide,
his glasses cracked, but sharp with pride.

"You fight well, but you don’t understand,
this island was never just palm trees and sand.
The rats? Just pawns, a simple game,
but now, dear Hunter—you’ll learn my name."

[Pre-Chorus: The Mind Unleashed]
The walls start shifting, metal alive,
Hunter’s trapped—nowhere to dive.
He tries to punch, tries to swing,
but the room itself begins to sting. (Uh… this feels bad)

Then—the scientist pulls a switch,
the world distorts, his thoughts start to glitch.
A voice in his head, static and pain,
his mind unraveling, tied in chains. (Get… outta… my…)

[Chorus: Breaking Free]
Wires coil, circuits spark,
his body’s frozen, mind goes dark.
Memories twist, past feels fake,
who is he really—what’s at stake?

But deep inside, something snaps,
the static clears, the system cracks.
One deep breath—he locks his gaze,
and for the first time, he’s unfazed.

(Nah. Not today) - Not today

[Verse 2: The Great Escape]
He breaks the hold, the lab goes red,
alarms scream loud, the scientist fled.
But Hunter ain't done, not letting him run,
the real fight's coming, and he wants some fun.

Tunnels collapse, steam erupts,
Hunter jumps as the ceiling corrupts.
A final door, a final test,
but what waits beyond ain't like the rest.

Rows of tubes—hundreds inside,
mechanical beasts, glowing with pride.
Not just rats, but something more,
a new breed waiting beyond the door.

The scientist whispers, voice so low—
“Welcome, Hunter… to Level Two.”

(To be continued…)

metadata.tags: Chicago rap, clear vocals, conscious drill, soul-trap, boom bap roots, pitched-down gospel samples, ambient vinyl crackle, reversed piano loops, 808 slides, spoken-word interludes, breath-heavy delivery, gritty realism, layered rhyme schemes, inner-city storytelling, chipmunk samples, samples
metadata.prompt:
[Intro]
Sometimes I wonder if the water remembers
All the faces it watched disappear...

[Verse 1]
Mama lit candles by the kitchen light
Prayin’ I’d come home and not another fight
Gunshots echo, that’s the lullaby
Sirens sing over babies cry
I used to dream of a safer block
Where doors ain’t locked and the clocks don’t stop
But time froze when my brother went away
Now his name's on the wall where the memories stay

I talk to shadows that walk with me
They know the struggle, the hustle, the heat
Every move’s a gamble, every step a bet
But the dice roll heavy when you’re swimmin’ in debt
I’m just tryna find peace, but it's hard to breathe
In a city where hope’s as rare as belief
But even in the dark, I still find the spark
Even when I’m lost, I’m still playin’ my part

[Pre-Chorus]
I ain't tryna be a statistic
I ain't tryna be just another name
But they teach you early in this game
To survive, you gotta learn how to fight through the pain

[Chorus]
Ashes in the lake, washed away with the rain
Everything we lose, everything we gain
I walk through the fire, but I’m still intact
Every step I take, I’m pullin' myself back
Ashes in the lake, but I still see the light
I’m chasin' tomorrow, but I’m fightin’ tonight
Every scar on my soul, every crack in the ground
I’ll be here forever, won’t let it bring me down

[Verse 2]
You can see it in the eyes, the pain’s deep-set
But you can’t hide from the struggle you ain’t met
Lost friends, lost time, but I keep pressin’
Every day’s a blessing, but it’s hard to learn the lesson
I’m out here tryna chase what’s left of me
Can’t let the ghosts bury me beneath the streets
I put my trust in these beats and these bars
I wear my heart on my sleeve, battle scars

[Pre-Chorus]
I ain't tryna be a statistic
I ain't tryna be just another name
But they teach you early in this game
To survive, you gotta learn how to fight through the pain

[Chorus]
Ashes in the lake, washed away with the rain
Everything we lose, everything we gain
I walk through the fire, but I’m still intact
Every step I take, I’m pullin' myself back
Ashes in the lake, but I still see the light
I’m chasin' tomorrow, but I’m fightin’ tonight
Every scar on my soul, every crack in the ground
I’ll be here forever, won’t let it bring me down

[Bridge]
They say the city don’t forgive, but I’m not here for forgiveness.
I’m here to learn, to grow, to make it out, even if it’s one step at a time.
'Cause in the end, it’s not the streets that define me.
It’s the fight in my heart.

[Chorus]
Ashes in the lake, washed away with the rain
Everything we lose, everything we gain
I walk through the fire, but I’m still intact
Every step I take, I’m pullin' myself back
Ashes in the lake, but I still see the light
I’m chasin' tomorrow, but I’m fightin’ tonight
Every scar on my soul, every crack in the ground
I’ll be here forever, won’t let it bring me down

[Outro]
Ashes in the lake... but we still rise.
Keep walkin’, keep fightin’, we still alive.

metadata.prompt:
yeah i really only came to kick it
something, like soccer, or judo 
my mind gone, to new planet
maybe pluto, 
who know? 
you really wanna fight like it's sumo
let it go motherfucker, who do you know?
weed will take you up to mars, baby i ain't talking bruno
i might even play my cards, yeah reverse like it's uno
look you gonna be a star, okay fine here yo' kudos
sorta like alaska, cold as ice, baby juno
meanwhile, ima take a break for a moment
deep breath in, baby pray for atonement
oh you show it? 
ima find a place to hold emotion
fore i phone in like a bomb threat, and blow it
back to the hangin', games playin on the play station
waste time, blurry like my eyes need lasik
baseline bumping you can hear it in a space ship
feeling like i'm playin for the lakers, amazin

[chorus]
so 
wanna vibe baby bring a friend
i extend my brother's hand 
i would rather stay in, rip the pen
before you! turn! off! all the lights! 

[verse 2]
cause we ain't got a 
lot of time left
i manuver like the heimlich, very upset
i been workin' like a migrant
all the success, ain't improved upon where i been
so ima do me and take another fuckin' night in
really? boy i see ya trippin psilocybin
spouting off some shit like you done opened up the hydrant
lovin' is the drug, but i don't know if you supplyin'
i don't want for this to get violent
but i take your silence, as guilt, or serious complicity
dont mistake my kindness, for any authenticity
i'ma turn the dial up to burn, in the sixth degree
one day we gonna make history, finna see



[chorus]
woah slow your roll
baby we ain't gonna do too much tonight
so you can slide
and come inside
but on your way please grab my food and flick the lights

cause this ain't magic
rather i'd say that it feels just quite alright
our love ain't average
your touch will keep me up into the night

wanna ride baby bring a friend, 
i extend my brothers hand
i would rather stay in bed
so please turn off the lights!

metadata.tags: Male vocal,Moody glitch-pop, experimental alt-electronic, stuttered emotive vocals, dark ambient undertones, lo-fi drum kit, glitchy synth arpeggios, rhythmic layering, restrained emotional delivery.
metadata.prompt:
[Intro]  
[Ambient synth pads, distant filtered vocals, no drums]  
Everybody is talking  
Nobody is stopping  
Everyone is sharing the dark part of their thoughts  
But turning away in the face of uncertainty,  
No sharing everything I've got, no  

[Chorus]  
[Lo-fi beat and bass drop in glitchy synth arpeggios, layered autotuned vocals]  
Don't begin withou-ou-ou-ou-out me,  
Don't begin withou-ou-ou-ou-out me.  
Even when I fault you, I'm so screwed without you,  
No, no…  

[Verse 1]  
[Vocals filtered minimal percussion]  
Scarfing down the system  
Starving out our existence  
Repeating our little phrases  
To try and save our own skin  
So they don't abuse us again  
The mental game is their name  
The part that keeps us sane  
Is us shouting out our own brains  
Sacrificed again  
Below us is our friends  
Hope you haven't forgot about me, no  

[Chorus]  
[Beat returns glitchy synths added harmonies on vocals]  
Don't begin withou-ou-ou-ou-out me,  
Don't begin withou-ou-ou-ou-out me.  
Even when I fault you, I'm so screwed without you,  
No, no, no, no  

[Verse 2]  
[Beat stripped back atmospheric synth swells]  
Starved by our own decisions  
Starved by their insecurities  
Starved by their authorities  
Starved out by my own immaturity  
These tears might be the death of me  
Tears lead to the darkness inside of me  
Don't know that part of me  

[Chorus]  
[Full arrangement emotive, restrained vocals]  
Don't begin withou-ou-ou-ou-out me,  
Don't begin withou-ou-ou-ou-out me.  
Even when I fault you, I'm so screwed without you,  
No, no, no, no  

[Bridge Outro Chant]  
[Chant with reverb instruments fade out gradually]  
Hey hey hey hey  
Hey hey hey hey  
Hey hey hey hey

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
// © 2025 Teemuth

🎵 Suno: https://suno.com/@teemuth

🎵 Spotify: open.spotify.com/artist/6OiYRjnt94boE4iFYvNZa5?si=n8GN72wDSkqZds7MJtY--w

📺 YouTube: youtube.com/@Teemuth_

🐦‍⬛ Twitter/X: x.com/real_teemuth

🎮 hyperfollow.com/realteemuth
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[Verse]
Said I’m a survivor (yeah!)
See how I’m smilin’ (uh)
Took all the pressure
Still I’m risin’ (woo!)
Ooh—

Been through the struggle (struggle)
Felt the whole quake (quake)
Didn’t lose shine—
Nah, I don’t break (don’t break!)
Still survivin’ (still here!)
Ooh—

[Pre-Chorus]
So let’s light up the rhythm (light it!)
Watch how I glide (watch me!)
Feel this momentum—
I’m touchin’ the sky (uh-huh!)
Oh—

[Chorus]
Survivor! (Say it loud!)
Survivor! (Beat that drum!)
Ooh—
Survivor! (Call me that!)
Survivor! (Can’t hold back!)
Ooh— (Ooh—)

[Verse]
Tried to break my spirit (they tried!)
They thought they could kill it (they lied!)
But I bounce back—
With more rhythm in it! (let’s ride!)
No—
They can’t touch this (nah!)
Mm—

And I know you feel me (you do!)
Look how far we’ve run (so far!)
Climbin’ through storms
Now we movin’ as one
Yeah—
Now we havin’ fun (say it!)
Uh—

[Chorus]
Survivor! (You know the name!)
Survivor! (No shame, no shame!)
Ooh—
Survivor! (Say it twice!)
Survivor! (That’s my life!)
Ooh— (Ooh!)

[Final Chorus]
Survivor! (You know the name!)
Survivor! (No shame, no shame!)
Ooh—
Survivor! (Say it twice!)
Survivor! (That’s my life!)
Ooh— (Ooh!)

Verso 1
Salíamos sin plan, solas por ahí,
Con mi amiga, siempre sabes cómo es.
Nada de preocupaciones, solo pasarla bien,
Unas risas, una cerveza, y todo es cien.
Coro
Tú y yo, sin pensar en nada,
Riendo todo el día, sin drama.
No hace falta mucho para disfrutar,
Con mi mejor amiga, no hay más que hablar.
Verso 2
Calle, música y un par de historias,
Hablando de todo, sin apuros ni glorias.
Lo bueno se da fácil cuando estamos juntas,
Así somos, sin estrés, sin vueltas.
Coro
Tú y yo, sin pensar en nada,
Riendo todo el día, sin drama.
No hace falta mucho para disfrutar,
Con mi mejor amiga, no hay más que hablar.
Puente
Y si el día se acaba, ya nos da igual,
Seguimos en lo nuestro, siempre real.
Lo importante es estar, nada más,
Todo fluye con ella, siempre al compás.
Coro
Tú y yo, sin pensar en nada,
Riendo todo el día, sin drama.
No hace falta mucho para disfrutar,
Con mi mejor amiga, no hay más que hablar.
Coro
Tú y yo, sin pensar en nada,
Riendo todo el día, sin drama.
No hace falta mucho para disfrutar,
Con mi mejor amiga, no hay más que hablar.

metadata.tags: quirky, unique voice, alternative r&b, art pop, progressive soul, introspective, progressive, psychedelic
metadata.prompt:
[Verse]
I'm losin' myself
I'm losin' my mind
Why did they leave me all out in the cold
With tears in my eyes

[Verse]
And I'm tryin' my best
To keep myself whole
But how can I give something to you
That is not in my own control

[Chorus]
I've loved people heartless
And I've fallen the hardest
I'm myself
I promise
But sometimes I'm someone else
I think I've lost my mind now
I just hope I'll be fine now
And it's nothing you've done wrong
I'm sorry I'm not strong
Someone told me I'm all wrong

[Bridge]
This is uncharted territory
But boy
Tell me different stories
And you
You say that I deserve the world
But I've already got what I want

[Verse]
'Cause I'm losin' myself
And I'm losin' my mind
Why did they leave me all out in the cold
To figure out why

[Instrumental break]

[Chorus]
I've loved people heartless
And I've fallen the hardest
I'm myself
I promise
But sometimes I'm someone else
And I think I've lost my mind now
'Cause when I learned the truth
I cried out
But I'll figure it all out

metadata.prompt:
[Intro] 

[Guitar Interlude]

[Verse]
Saw her in the moonlight sneakin through the night
Eyes like glowing embers set the world alight
Heart of mischief laughter’s on the rise
Danger in her smile oh baby’s got snake eyes

[Pre-Chorus]
Charming eyes so bright
Her love is a painful delight (oh yeah)
You won’t know until she bites

[Chorus]
Every step she takes she’s light and free
Lurking in the shadows fate’s decree
Whispers of her past they mesmerize
Careful where you tread ‘cause baby’s got snake eyes

[Break]
[Instrumental Interlude]

[Verse 2]
Walking on a tightrope charm is her disguise
Trading sweetened venom and the sweetest lies
Mystery woman’s got me so hypnotized
Falling for her spell now baby’s got snake eyes

[Pre-Chorus]
Charming eyes so bright
Her love is a painful delight (oh yeah)
You won’t know until she bites

[Chorus]
Every step she takes she’s light and free
Lurking in the shadows fate’s decree
Whispers of her past they mesmerize
Careful where you tread ‘cause baby’s got snake eyes

[Break]
[Instrumental Interlude]

[Bridge]
She’s a secret weapon under moonlit skies
A riddle wrapped in starlight truth belies
Caught in her enchantment took me by surprise
I’m frozen in her stare ‘cause baby’s got snake eyes

[Guitar Solo]

[Verse 3]
Her snaky curves coiled around me
She sinks her fangs into me
Now stricken by her poison
I am doomed to her dungeon ‘cause baby’s got snake eyes

[Pre-Chorus]
Charming eyes so bright
Her love is a painful delight (oh yeah)
You won’t know until she bites

[Chorus]
Every step she takes she’s light and free
Lurking in the shadows fate’s decree
Whispers of her past they mesmerize
Careful where you tread ‘cause baby’s got snake eyes

[Instrumental Fadeout]

[End]

metadata.tags: synthwave, lo-fi, indie rock, disco dance, phonk beat
metadata.prompt:
[Intro]
Oh, I’m tracing stars with a broken map — still lost, je me perds, je me perds
Ah, I’m calling out but your heart’s off-track — pas de lumière, pas de repère

[Verse 1]
Caught in a maze of my mind, I can’t tell where I began
Des ombres sur les murs, des pas inconnus — où suis-je vraiment ?
I picture your face in the firelight, but I’m scared to touch the flame
One step forward, two back in time, je danse encore avec ton nom

[Pre-Chorus]
But I still believe you’re out there somewhere
Donne-moi un signe, je viendrai vers toi
You bring the silence, I’ll bring the sky
Sous les étoiles gelées, je crie pour toi

[Chorus]
Ah-woo, searching for you with a compass, mais tu t’effaces, tu te caches
Oh-oh, love in your heart like a fortress, je ne peux pas monter, je ne peux pas
Ah-woo, calling your name through the night wind, le vent me trahit encore
Haha, of course I’d chase the impossible—c’est ma folie, c’est mon sort

[Verse 2]
Leave me alone if you need to, I still hold the dream inside
Tu me manques comme l’aube, quand les larmes commencent à tomber
It hurts ‘cause it’s all too familiar—my clock says there’s half an hour
Dis-moi, où es-tu maintenant ? Et qui suis-je sans ta lumière ?

[Pre-Chorus]
Still got the fire, still got the map
Trace-moi une route, je n’abandonnerai pas
You bring the distance, I’ll bring the run
À travers les mondes, je cours vers toi

[Chorus]
Ah-woo, searching for you with a compass, mais tu t’éloignes, tu disparais
Oh-oh, love in your heart like a fortress, je frappe, mais rien ne s’ouvre jamais
Ah-woo, calling your name through the night wind, mais ton écho s’efface
Haha, of course I’d chase the impossible — j’y vais, quoi qu’il se passe

[Bridge]
Ah, ah, ah, ah — tu m’entends, là-haut ?
Oh, oh, oh, oh — je parle aux nuages
We were planets misaligned, now I float, I fly
Je poursuis ton ombre dans le ciel froid

[Final Chorus]
Ah-woo, still searching for you with a compass, mais je ne te trouve jamais
Oh-oh, love in your heart still haunts me — ça brûle encore, je ne peux l’oublier
Ah-woo, I scream through the void with a last breath, peut-être tu m’entendras
Haha... but if you don’t, je garde l’espoir, je te laisse là

[Outro]
Oh, I’m tracing stars with a broken map — je suis perdu, mais j’essaie, j’essaie
Ah, maybe your love was a ghostlight... mais je me lève, je me lève, je me lève

metadata.prompt:
[Female - Intro]
nah nah nah
la la la
nah nah nah
la la la

[Female - Verse ]
I just packed my bag
Left you so slowly
You can keep all of your things
Act like you know me
Heard the words you said
You never showed me
Now you tryna slide right back
I’m done - don’t hold me

[Female - Pre-Chorus]:
I don’t wanna play you like the old me 
You don’t hit my line sayin’ you wanna hold me 
Now you in your feels, yeah babe I know that
Tryna spin the block, no baby, I won’t go back

[Female - Chorus]:
You told me
You know me
Then showed me
You don’t own me  
You told me
You know me
Then showed me
You don’t own me

[Male Rap Verse]:
I ain’t say the right things when I had the time
Too busy tryna win, caught up in my pride
You was movin’ different, I ain't even ask why
Now I'm scrollin' through your page just to feel that high

I ain’t think you’d leave, thought you'd ride or stay
Now your bag packed up, you ain’t call all day
You got cold in the eyes, no words to say
Guess the real ones leave when you move that way

[Female & Male - Chorus]:
You told me
You know me
Then showed me
You don’t own me  
You told me
You know me
Then showed me
You don’t own me

[Outro]
